about.title: About Us
about.description: Club Esportiu Joventut TT promotes social inclusion through table tennis in Sant Josep de sa Talaia. We run activities across schools and municipal venues, engaging children, youth, seniors and people with disabilities to foster health, community and personal growth.
about.mission: Use table tennis as a tool for inclusion and wellbeing with accessible programs for all ages and abilities, prioritising kids, seniors and people with disabilities.
about.vision: Become a reference in Ibiza for inclusive sport and represent the island in the national circuit, showing how sport can transform lives and strengthen community.
about.valuesLead: We work with the community and institutions to build an active, healthy and inclusive environment.
about.valuesDesc: Principles that guide every club activity

values.inclusionDesc: Barrier-free access to sport: age, gender or ability. Specific programs for disability and vulnerable groups.
values.integrationDesc: Intergenerational activities linking school, family and community.
values.developmentDesc: Personal growth, physical & mental health, and active habits through regular practice.

trainings.title: Training Programs
trainings.description: Discover the training program that best fits your level and availability. At Club Esportiu Joventut TT in Sant Josep de sa Talaia we offer 1.5-hour table tennis sessions designed to improve technique, fitness, and game confidence. Choose your plan and enjoy motivating, inclusive, and effective training.
trainings.mainProgramsDesc: Choose the program that matches your skill level and commitment
trainings.beginnerDesc: Start in table tennis without rushing, but with motivation.
trainings.competitionDesc: Notice improvement week after week and level up.
trainings.adultsDesc: Train intensely and reach your best version.
trainings.specialProgramsDesc: Additional training options for specific needs
trainings.youthDesc: Specialized program for young talents aged 8-16
trainings.flexSchedule: Choose the schedule that suits you best among available sessions (flexible)
trainings.completeTraining: Complete training with technical, tactical, and physical work
trainings.youthMore: Solid technical fundamentals, coordination and agility through games and circuits, sports habits and goal-based tracking.
trainings.privateMore: Technical diagnosis with immediate corrections, personal progression plan, video analysis and competition prep.
trainings.corporateMore: Team dynamics to improve communication and cooperation. Inclusive, fun activities. Custom packages at your site or at our club.
